mdRecord.dcterms:title: Plat of West Clifton Forge Subdivision, Alleghany County Virginia / acquired by the Chesapeake and Ohio Development Company, Decatur Axtell President, Geo. W. Lewis, General Manager, John Tyler Jr. Engineer
Map of West Clifton Forge
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: A. Hoen & Co.
Chesapeake and Ohio Development Company.
Eakle, August & Donovan (Firm)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Issued by Eakle, August & Donovan, Agents, Chesapeake & Ohio Development Co.
Photo lith. by A. Hoen & Co.)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 34 x 56 cm. on sheet 36 x 58 cm. folded to 19 x 8 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows street names and lot numbers and identifies "timber and iron ore land," and land "reserved for the Chesapeake and Ohio Railway Company for railroad purposes and encouragement of industries."
Folded into pink paper covers with title "Map of West Clifton Forge. (Pocket Edition.) Issued by Eakle, August and Donovan, Agents Chesapeake & Ohio Development Co. Clifton Forge, Va."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Real property--Virginia--Clifton Forge--Maps.
Real estate development--Virginia--Clifton Forge--Maps.
Clifton Forge (Va.)--Maps.
